name: Infamous: Festival of Blood
summary:
nfamous: Festival of Blood (stylized as inFAMOUS: Festival of Blood) is a DLC game on PlayStation Network. Festival of Blood is a standalone game in the Infamous series and does not require an Infamous 2 game disc in order to play.
The story is set aside from the canon aspect of the Infamous series, being a spoof told by the main protagonist's friend Zeke Dunbar. The game features new characters, powers and comes with a new comic cutscene creation for the main game Infamous 2's UGC (User-Generated Content), as well as support for the PlayStation Move controller.
